title: Drumming & Band
description: Started at 5, earned China’s highest certificate at 15; 8+ performances; led own band senior year.

car.challenge: Build performance mastery and stage presence over years of training.
car.action: Daily practice, learned improvisation, joined and led school band, organized performances.
car.result: Passed Level 10 certificate; 8+ shows; leadership and collaboration demonstrated.

title: Weekly Activity (All year)
description: Ongoing weekly commitment developing skills and consistency across the school year.

car.challenge: Balance academics and long-term skill development.
car.action: Dedicated recurring time each week; tracked goals and milestones.
car.result: Sustained progress and output without impacting academics.

title: Peer Collaboration Platform Research
description: Co-founded platform concept to help peers find resources and collaborators; completed research paper.

car.challenge: Peers lacked a way to find collaborators and resources.
car.action: Formed team, did user research, scoped features, and wrote research paper.
car.result: Clear problem definition and validated solution concept documented in paper.

title: Food Expiration Reminder Demo
description: Identified food waste; built app concept and hardware demo for expiration reminders via sensors & light.

car.action: Surveys, defined spec; built app concept; prototyped hardware reminder light.
car.result: Working demos and user insights to reduce waste.

title: Academic Week AI Talk
description: Sole student speaker; shared AI insights to 500+ offline and 20,000 online; refined speech for 4 weeks.

car.challenge: Communicate AI insights to broad audience effectively.
car.action: Iterated speech for weeks; rehearsed delivery; engaged diverse attendees.
car.result: Reached 20k+ online and 500+ offline with strong feedback.

title: Skiing Training
description: Winter ski immersion in northwest China; trained both skis and snowboard; built perseverance.

car.challenge: Master snowboarding from scratch in limited time.
car.action: Intensive daily practice, repeated falls, reviewed technique.

title: Symphony Orchestra Percussion Lead
description: Led percussion; performed timpani, snare, bass drum in two small and one large concert.

car.challenge: Coordinate percussion section for multiple performances.

title: Capstone: Physics Teaching Aids
description: Created hands-on aids with teacher to explain abstract physics; iterated on student feedback.

car.challenge: Peers struggled with abstract physics concepts.
car.action: Identified needs; designed and 3D printed aids; classroom tests.
car.result: Improved comprehension; positive feedback from students.

title: Moonshot Hackathon: AI for Aging
description: Led 5-person team to build AI solution addressing elderly isolation and intergenerational gaps in 48h.

car.action: Team research; LLM + data features; rapid prototyping.
car.result: Working demo; clear problem framing and impact narrative.

title: Wheel-Legged Robot & Competition
description: Built wheel-legged robot from open-source; learned control; competed at Alibaba Sports Games showcase.

car.challenge: Achieve stable mobility with limited resources.
car.action: Adapted designs, tuned control, iterative testing.
car.result: Functional robot; competition experience and visibility.
